text: After assessing previously published methods, we developed a practical approach to adjusting insulin doses using rtCGM trend arrows in pediatric patients with diabetes.
title: A Practical Approach to Using Trend Arrows on the Dexcom G5 CGM System to Manage Children and Adolescents With Diabetes.
